code: import axios from'axios';import{useMutation,useQuery}from'react-query';export const useGetUserManagementApi=request=>{return useQuery(['get_restaurents',request],()=>axios({method:'GET',url:"/get_user_new/",params:request}));};export const useGetUserDetailsApi=slno=>{return useQuery(['get_subadmin_restaurant'],()=>axios({method:'GET',url:"/get_user_new/".concat(slno,"/")}));};export const useBlockUserApi=()=>{return useMutation(info=>axios({method:'POST',url:"/block_user/".concat(info.id,"/")}));};export const useUpdateKYCStatusApi=()=>{return useMutation(info=>axios({method:'POST',url:"/kyc_approval_status/",data:info.request}));};
